Logistics Officer (Male) Job at Harmony Sanitary Limited




        
    

        
        Harmony Sanitary Limited is a leading brand specializing in high-quality household sanitary ware, focusing on providing durable and reliable products at competitive prices. They offer various products, including executive set WCs and water closets suitable for residential, commercial, and hospitality settings. Harmony Sanitary aims to be the go-to brand for those seeking value and quality in their sanitaryware purchases.
 

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Officer (Male)

Job Location: Orile Iganmu / Coker Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities

	Record and keep accurate information on waybill.
	Update the waybill book
	Prompt distribution of products to customers as requested.
	Ensure there is no damage of products arising from personal handling.
	Provide logistics reports as and at when needed
	Monitoring of sales of products through branch stock report before releasing products
	Ensure products are picked up for delivery to customers as at when due.
	Other ad hoc projects relating to stock and system management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor  Degree in a related field.
	At least  2 - 4 year of experience
	Excellent communication skills, both oral and verbal
	Great interpersonal skills
	Customer service and relationship-building skills
	Teamworking skills
	Strong attention to details
	Analytical Skills
	Preferable between 20- 40 years of age.


Salary
N100,00 - N150,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
